snippet.title: I Stand Amazed (with lyrics) - The most BEAUTIFUL hymn!
snippet.description:
🎧Download hymn mp3 (exclusively on Patreon!): https://www.patreon.com/rosemarysiemens
💿 Hymn CD's: https://rosemarysiemens.com/store
🎼 Sheet Music: https://rosemarysiemens.com/store

E M A I L  L I S T:
Sign up to get the latest Sunday Hymn Serenade hymn delivered to your email inbox every Sunday!
http://bit.ly/SundayHymnSerenade-Email-List

C O N N E CT:
F A C E B O O K ➜  https://www.facebook.com/rosemarysiemens
I N S T A G R A M ➜ https://www.instagram.com/rosemarysiemens
T E L E G R A M  G R O U P ➜ https://t.me/RosemarySiemens 
W E B S I T E ➜  https://rosemarysiemens.com
E M A I L ➜ rosemarysiemens@gmail.com 

S U P P O R T:
P A T R E O N ➜  https://www.patreon.com/rosemarysiemens
P A Y P A L ➜ http://bit.ly/PayPal-SundayHymnSerenade

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
I Stand Amazed (with lyrics) The most BEAUTIFUL hymn you've EVER heard!  - December 1, 2021 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
I hope you enjoy this beautiful and calming hymn “I Stand Amazed” with lyrics in this stunning location!

Hymn Sheet Music:
http://www.rosemarysiemens.com/store/

Hymn Backing Tracks:
http://www.rosemarysiemens.com/store/

I Stand Amazed:
0:00 - Intro (Violin)
0:06 - Verse 1 (I stand amazed in the presence)
0:29 - Chorus (How marvelous, how wonderful)
0:52 - Verse 2 (He took my sins and my sorrows)
1:15 - Chorus (How marvelous, how wonderful)
1:41 - Chorus (Violin Melody)
2:04 - Verse 3 (When with the ransomed in glory)
2:28 - Chorus (How marvelous, how wonderful)
2:51 - Chorus (How marvelous, how wonderful)

Join me live for a NEW hymn EVERY Sunday at 10am EST for my Sunday Hymn Serenade series on YouTube! 

CD's and MP3's of all Sunday Hymn Serenade hymns are available exclusively on Patreon! 💿🎶 👇🏻
https://www.patreon.com/rosemarysiemens

If you would like to donate to my musical ministry via PayPal:
https://rosemarysiemens.com/sponsor

Mail Me! 
142-757 West Hastings Street, Suite 293
Vancouver, BC V6C 1A1
Canada

Feel free to use any of my hymns for online church services! If you would like me to record a special greeting for your church or viewing audience, please email me at rosemarysiemens@gmail.com 

🎵 My Music is Available Here: 🎵
► My Website: https://rosemarysiemens.com/store/
► iTunes: http://bit.ly/RosemarySiemens_itunes 
► Amazon: http://bit.ly/RosemarySiemens_AmazonMusic
► Spotify: http://bit.ly/RosemarySiemensSpotify 
► All Other Platforms: https://fanlink.to/RosemarySiemens


Music Credits:
Rosemary Siemens: Piano, vocals, solo violin, string orchestra
Recorded and Produced by Eli Bennett


Sunday Hymn Serenade is made and produced by E&R Film Productions

“I Stand Amazed” lyrics:

I stand amazed in the presence
Of Jesus the Nazarene
And wonder how He could love me
A sinner, condemned, unclean

How marvelous, how wonderful
And my song shall ever be
How marvelous, how wonderful
Is my Savior's love for me

He took my sins and my sorrows
He made them His very own
He bore the burden to Calvary
And suffered and died alone

How marvelous, how wonderful
And my song shall ever be
How marvelous, how wonderful
Is my Savior's love for me

When with the ransomed in glory
His face I at last shall see
'Twill be my joy through the ages
To sing of His love for me

How marvelous, how wonderful
And my song shall ever be
How marvelous, how wonderful
Is my Savior's love for me

How marvelous, how wonderful
And my song shall ever be
How marvelous, how wonderful
Is my Savior's love for me

#IStandAmazed #IStandAmazedLyrics #HymnLyricVideo
tags: i stand amazed hymn lyrics youtube
i stand amazed oh how marvelous
